title: Minus 38: A Story of Resilience
description: MINUS 38 is a story of personal family tragedy mixed with the uncertainty of what actually happened. Grieving early parental loss and coping with the distress resulted in childhood trauma for each sibling and its challenges. The events that unfold encompass addiction, mental health and a dysfunctional family unit. Shelline navigates her story uniquely through the lens of relatable musical lyrics of the '60s, '70s and '80s, and includes her special skill in handwriting analysis to help her move forward with her life. A story of resilience!
author: Shelline Kovacs
